title: Champions IRL
body:
{{champion:267}} Pick a league character and find an actor to act them out! If they are a monster champion, or unable to be played by a human pick a voice actor! :)

For some reason, Katarina always screams Laura Prepon to me.

https://encrypted-tbn3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSg-K8njBY6xWAbEqbtDMQ7tsTgOU3HOpuXiMVugthc8j9L0RQ9
http://images1.fanpop.com/images/photos/1200000/Laura-laura-prepon-1295871-800-600.jpg
